messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re:Caren's response to ' Transition harder for me than my kid'
messages.msgSnippet: CarenI loved this! And we have a little resource room of officially educational stuff (our craft supplies are in there too) which we haven t touxched in
messages.messageBody:
CarenI loved this! And we have a little 'resource room' of officially educational stuff (our craft supplies are in there too) which we haven't touxched in years but now I see I have thought they were somehow too valuable-looking to throw out. Thanks for your encouragement--out they go!! They did serve a purpose, though. Clear proof of our solid efforts down a pathway that did not work and does not need to be revisited. Thanks for that last comment to "burn everything 'educational' in our home!! Cameron

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
